name: Guy Chretien
text: My son and I wandered in and it was already past closing time.  Barbara and her staff could not have been nicer.  They made us a fresh pizza and even though it was the end of the day and I am sure that they were looking forward to closing they were super sweet and the pizza was awesome!

name: Kristi Sarchi
text: Hadn't been to a Papa Gino's since it used to be in the Auburn Mall in Maine. I was driving by and decided to pull in to see if it was good as I remembered. The pizza was great! I was the only person in the entire store so I could hear the staff arguing complaining which impacted atmosphere. But the pizza was exactly as I remembered it!

name: Bill Shoemaker
text: Great place for a quick slice of pizza. Food was served hot and staff was friendly. Rest rooms were clean. The quality of the food is consistent with most other Papa Gino's. Restroom was clean and organized.

name: Kenn Soendergaard
text: Very slow service and mediocre food. If you are looking for a quick stop and to get back on the road... Don't choose thus Papa Gino's location.

name: Laura Jordan
text: The food at this chain is acceptable, but do not waste your time w delivery.  I ordered a pie online, it gives a wait time of over and hour and a half.  I call 2 hours after ordering and they havent even made the pizza yet (and they had the …More

name: Maximilian Ma
text: We walked into Papa Gino's full of ambition and appitite for the allyoucaneat. We survived the first round of 🍕 with a mere 💓 burn. We also found the claw machines rigged. The second round saw us battling the ordering process and losing …More

name: Chris Brogan
text: The food quality is fine. Just don't do delivery. I've had MULTIPLE orders delivered late by over 30 minutes on the quoted time. Upon calling, you do get an "I'm sorry." You don't get any rebate. You don't get anything besides incompetence. …More

name: Mark Goddard
text: Always takes too long to deliver. This location has below average taste

name: Charles Hall
text: The guy that answered the phone seemed distracted, and it turned out he was.  He added an unordered drink to my order.  No problem.  However, I went out of my way to ask for plates and plastic utensils, as I'm staying at a hotel.  Guess …More

name: Dawn Fisher
text: What a joke. Ordered online, when I went in to pickup my order was told they didn't have my order. I had already paid and now I'm told it will be another 45 minutes. Now you would think my pizza and the rest of my order would have been pipping got, I'm 5 minutes away, the pizza was cold. What a waste of my time and money.

name: Mike Spenard
text: Routine issues. No slices available at noon on occasions. Very very slow to serve orders. Don’t waste your time here.

name: Fred Santos
text: Not sure if I picked a bad night at  Salisbury location or if pizza recipe has changed, I hadn't got PGs for a few years but remember the fresh dough , nice tomato-i.e.  sauce , and unique cheese taste, the pizza here was extremely salty …More

name: David Spoor
text: Restaurant was filthy. Manager had no control over staff. Young female employee was loud and obnoxious in the back. Garbage was overflowing. Waited 15 minutes to cook my lunch. Told manager twice that there is no ice in the ice machine. …More

name: Carol J Cohen
text: Good service, pizza oily,

name: Nathan Sanford
text: I ordered and then arrived to pick up about 30 minutes later, they hadn't started my order yet despite having been given a 25 minute wait time. They didn't tell me this, but I saw them put my order in after I arrived. After waiting a while …More

name: Camden Herlihy
text: If I tip you $8 (Roughly 40% of the order total) and tell you to deliver a message to the person you are delivering too, you f****** deliver the message. Apparently the person who delivered the order was above that. Enjoy your tip asshat.

name: justin takesian
text: Yeah the grill worker Justin is really handsome and he makes a mean steak and cheese. What a guy. I wish i could be him ❤❤

name: Ryan Taylor
text: Even though my food came in a very quick & timely manner, delicious as well, they messed up my order and the cashier was poorly trained and confused. I asked politely for some cinnamon sticks as well and she never even put them in my order.

name: Karen Bona
text: Best mac & cheese pizza that I ever had!

name: Jim McCrimmon
text: Very good service and pizza

name: Jean Power
text: Great and friendly staff.

name: Nicole Hardy
text: Awful service, and rude employees. they lost our slip and kept telling us it would be ready in a few minutes when they hadn't even started it. Took over an hr to receive our food. NEVER going back there

name: Totallycool@gmail.com Cool
text: very very slow

name: Aly Daaboul
text: Ordered online and three hours later I still didn’t get my food even after I called. I ended up canceling my order... the worst restaurant 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻

name: Matthew Woitunski
text: Ordered pizza 2 1/2 hours ago, sure wish it would show up.

name: Bronson Duarte
text: It sucked waited for a pizza for 45 mins while everyone else got there order before.
